name: DMS Simple Math Game
short_description:
This Programme is specially designed to age 5-9 children (UKG, Grade 1-4) gain their mathematic foundation of Addition (+) and Subtract (-).
This programme automatically generate 19 quiz randomly with random numbers in random places with random math(+ or -). Child should find the correct number for each quiz. 
While running this programme in PC, child cannot access any other application or cannot load any work in  PC, the only way to exit from this programme is answer all quiz correctly or giving following password to password text box.(User Still can eliminate math programme using task manager) But , If child finish with all correct answers the math programme only allow to use PC for 1/2hour period to the child for his or her favorit game or something, after ½ hour period elapsed math programme popup with new page and ready to give another ½ hour period to child after all quiz done correctly. And so on… until exit with correct password.
Password: (191118)
